overview: These days it's not easy for young girls to survive on their own. Rising rents make meager paychecks that much smaller and when you add in unscrupuous landlords, these young beauties find themselves in some difficult situations. Luckily, these hotties are willing to use their natural attributes and naughty minds to find a solution that works for everyone.
tagline: It's Very Simple. Get On Your Knees Or It's On The Street You Go!
title: My Creepy Landlord Next Door
